info.name: NextFrame
info.summary: Embeddable Nextcloud topbar to bring your services together!
info.description: This app creates a simple endpoint with the common HTML components to any Nextcloud view, with a public and logged in variant. This is intended to improve the "togetherness" of non-Nextcloud services with Nextcloud/OIDC login capabilities.
info.author: Karim Vergnes
